LanguageData.Failure_FacilityBreakdown.label: 设施崩溃
LanguageData.Failure_RadiationLeak.label: 辐射泄漏
LanguageData.Failure_RadiationLeak.description: 该设施正在短促地泄漏辐射
LanguageData.Failure_MicrowaveLeak.label: 微波泄漏
LanguageData.Failure_MicrowaveLeak.description: 该设施正在泄漏微波辐射
LanguageData.Failure_AcidLeak.label: 强酸泄漏
LanguageData.Failure_GasLeak.label: 气体泄漏
LanguageData.Failure_GasLeak.description: 该设施正在泄漏有毒气体
LanguageData.Failure_BlindingFlash.label: 致盲强光
LanguageData.Failure_BlindingFlash.description: 一道刺眼的闪光从设施中射出
LanguageData.Failure_ArcDischarge.label: 电弧放电
LanguageData.Failure_ArcDischarge.description: 一道高压电弧从设施中射出
LanguageData.Failure_LaserDischarge.label: 激光放射
LanguageData.Failure_LaserDischarge.description: 一道激光从设施中射出
LanguageData.Failure_Overvoltage.label: 过压
LanguageData.Failure_Overvoltage.description: 该设施遭遇电涌并引发火灾
LanguageData.Failure_ShortCircuit.label: 短路
LanguageData.Failure_ShortCircuit.description: 该设施已经短路。立即关闭电源，否则建筑物将被毁坏！
